StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCurrentRecruiterBilletData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int AS
declare @short_descrip.on varchar(30), @billet_begin_date varchar(30), @billet_end_date varchar(30), @e.ec.ve_date varchar(30), @billet_begin_date_sort date.me, @previous_billet_begin_date varchar(30), @row_count int, @organiza.onId int, @recrui.ng_person_id int, @recruiter_history_id int
SET @previous_billet_begin_date = NULL SET @row_count = 0
CREATE TABLE #BILLET_DATA (SHORT_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(62), BILLET_BEGIN_DATE VARCHAR(30), BILLET_END_DATE VARCHAR(30), EFFECTIVE_DATE VARCHAR(30), BILLET_BEGIN_DATE_SORT DATETIME, RECRUITING_PERSON_ID int, RECRUITER_HISTORY_ID int, ORGANIZATION_ID int, UNIT_ABBREVIATION int)
DECLARE billet_data CURSOR FOR
SELECT RR.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), RP.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), RP.BILLET_END_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BILLET_END_DATE, NULL AS EFFECTIVE_DATE, RP.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE AS BILLET_BEGIN_DATE_SORT, ORGANIZATION_ID, RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, 0 AS RECRUITER_HISTORY_ID FROM RECRUITING_PERSON RP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ROLE RR ON (RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = RR.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID AND RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID)
OPEN billet_data
FETCH next from billet_data INTO @short_descrip.on, @billet_begin_date, @billet_end_date, @e.ec.ve_date, @billet_begin_date_sort, @organiza.onId, @recrui.ng_person_id, @recruiter_history_id
IF (@@fetch_status = 0) BEGIN INSERT INTO #BILLET_DATA VALUES(@short_descrip.on,@billet_begin_date, NULL, @e.ec.ve_date, @billet_begin_date_sort, @recrui.ng_person_id, @recruiter_history_id, @organiza.onId, NULL) END
CLOSE billet_data DEALLOCATE billet_data
SELECT SHORT_DESCRIPTION, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, BILLET_END_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE_SORT, RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, RECRUITER_HISTORY_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, UNIT_ABBREVIATION FROM #BILLET_DATA
